data.chText: （某地或某历史时期的）服装，装束
data.enText: the clothes worn by people from a particular place or during a particular historical period
the clothes worn by actors in a play or film/movie, or worn by sb to make them look like sth else

data.chText: 这些演员仍是戏装打扮。
data.enText: The actors were still in costume and make-up.

data.chText: 她在这出戏里要换四次服装。
data.enText: She has four costume changes during the play.

data.chText: 他是打扮成一只大鸡去参加聚会的。
data.enText: He went to the party in a giant chicken costume.

tr: the attire worn in a play or at a fancy dress ball
example: he won the prize for best costume

tr: the attire characteristic of a country or a time or a social class
unusual or period attire not characteristic of or appropriate to the time and place
example: in spite of the heat he insisted on his woolen costume

tr: the prevalent fashion of dress (including accessories and hair style as well as garments)

example: We dressed up for Halloween as pumpkins

tr: as for a film or play

value.def: An actor's or performer's costume is the set of clothes they wear while they are performing.

example.ex: Even from a distance the effect of his fox costume was stunning...
example.tran: 即使从远处看,他的狐狸戏服也很抢眼。

example.ex: The performers, in costume and make-up, were walking up and down backstage...
example.tran: 上了妆穿着戏服的演员在后台走来走去。

example.ex: In all, she has eight costume changes.

value.tran: (演员或表演者的)戏服，表演服装

value.def: The clothes worn by people at a particular time in history, or in a particular country, are referred to as a particular type of costume .

example.tran: 身穿18世纪服装的男男女女

example.ex: In the colourful markets at Chincero and Pisac, women still wear their traditional costume.
example.tran: 在金测罗和皮萨克五颜六色的集市上，女人们还是身着传统装束。

value.tran: (某历史时期或某国的)服装，装束

value.def: A costume play or drama is one which is set in the past and in which the actors wear the type of clothes that were worn in that period.

example.ex: ...a lavish costume drama set in Ireland and the US in the 1890s.
example.tran: 一部耗资巨大、以19世纪90年代的爱尔兰和美国为背景的古装戏

trans: 剧服设计；最佳服装；最佳服装设计；最佳服装设计奖；服装设计
中装；中式服装；中国服装
